overview: This film consists of three stories. The first story is about Ryan alias Sasak Adi, a young Sasak native who lives with his uncle (his mother died while giving birth to Ryan) in Jakarta. The second story is about Anjani, a Sasak woman who is obedient and still respects her cultural values. The third is about Wati (Aufa Asfarina Febrianggie), who lives in the same village as Anjani, talkative about following trends.
title: Perempuan Sasak Terakhir
